description: A list of books in various states

list.description: The year that a list reflects. For example: 2023.

goal.description: A target number of books to complete relating to this list. Generally used when the list name reflects a particular year.

subtitle.description: The subtitle of this book, if it has one. Set to null if there isn't one.

cover.description: The URL for the OpenLibrary cover image used for this book

link.description: The URL for the OpenLibrary page for this book

anyOf.description: The date that you finished reading this book. Use null if you haven't finished reading this book yet.
The date that you finished reading this book. Use null if you haven't finished reading this book yet.

rating.description: The rating that you would give this book out of 5. Use null if you haven't finished reading this book yet.

progress.description: Your current progress through the book between 0 and 100

reader_id.description: The alphanumeric ID for this item in Readwise Reader to sync progress from
